channel.title: Audio on Project Azar
channel.description: Recent content in Audio on Project Azar

item.title: Pop Pop Pop Goes the Speaker
item.description: I’m using this blog as a log of troubleshooting steps I’ve done before, so I don’t waste my time the next time I nuke my computer and try again. We’ll see if this is ever really helpful. Today’s bug: audio-popping and lag when audio starts playing after sitting idle for a while. Ah, this is a classic. I know I’ve solved this bug probably a dozen times in my life with Linux.
